analysis.summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a reusable "featured" SVG icon with customizable fill color and accepts extra classes via attributes.
analysis.purpose: Provides a presentational icon component for the UI—specifically a "featured" badge or star icon—allowing consumers to change its fill color and apply custom CSS classes.

components.name: IconFeatured
components.responsibility: Render an SVG path forming the "featured" icon. Accepts a `fill` prop for color and forwards extra attributes (e.g., class names) to the root `<svg>`.

functions.name: defineProps
functions.purpose: Vue 3 `<script setup>` macro to declare component props.

fill.description: CSS color value used as the fill of the SVG path.

dependencies: CSS variable `--black` for default fill color
analysis.usage:
Import the component and use it in a parent template, optionally passing a `fill` color or CSS classes:

```js
import IconFeatured from 'modules/icons/entities/IconFeatured.vue'
```

```html
<IconFeatured fill="#ff0" class="icon-large" />
```
notes: No `<style>` block defined; styling is controlled via the `fill` prop and external CSS classes.
The component is purely presentational and has no reactive or lifecycle logic.
Uses `$attrs.class` binding to merge parent-provided class names onto the SVG element.
